skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: With a strong proficiency in React, I craft engaging and dynamic user interfaces that enhance user experiences. My expertise lies in developing responsive and performant web applications using React's component-based architecture. I am skilled in managing application state with tools like Redux, and I ensure seamless interaction through efficient use of hooks and context. My projects showcase a deep understanding of React’s lifecycle methods, JSX, and modern JavaScript (ES6+), combined with a commitment to best practices and clean, maintainable code.

skills.title: Mobile App
skills.description: As a Flutter developer, I specialize in creating beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase. Leveraging the power of Dart, I build high-performance, visually appealing cross-platform applications that offer a seamless user experience. My skills include working with Flutter widgets to create custom UI components, managing state with Provider and Bloc, and integrating APIs for dynamic functionality. I am dedicated to following Flutter’s best practices, ensuring that my applications are scalable, maintainable, and optimized for performance.
